mapper.sql: C.ID as id, C.DIVISI_KD as divisi_kd, C.SUBDIV_KD as subdiv_kd, C.DEPT_KD as dept_kd, C.LOK_KD as lok_kd, C.NO_PPUC as no_ppuc, C.TGL_PPUC as tgl_ppuc, C.SEND_DATE as send_date, C.SEND_TIME as send_time, C.STATUS as status, C.ISI_SMS as isi_sms, C.HP_MAKER as hp_maker, C.HP_APPROVAL as hp_approval, C.USER_CREATE as user_create, C.TGL_CREATE as tgl_create

WHERE 1=1 AND ( divisi_kd like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR subdiv_kd like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR dept_kd like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR lok_kd like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR no_ppuc like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR send_time like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR status like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR isi_sms like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR hp_maker like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR hp_approval like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_create like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log_sms ( ID, DIVISI_KD, SUBDIV_KD, DEPT_KD, LOK_KD, NO_PPUC, TGL_PPUC, SEND_DATE, SEND_TIME, STATUS, ISI_SMS, HP_MAKER, HP_APPROVAL, USER_CREATE, TGL_CREATE ) values ( #{id}, #{divisi_kd}, #{subdiv_kd}, #{dept_kd}, #{lok_kd}, #{no_ppuc}, #{tgl_ppuc}, #{send_date, JDBCTYPE=TIMESTAMP}, #{send_time}, #{status}, #{isi_sms}, #{hp_maker}, #{hp_approval}, #{user_create}, #{tgl_create, JDBCTYPE=TIMESTAMP} )
